A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Given what the film had to work with leading in from The Force Awakens\, I thought I wasn't going to like it. I love it when I'm proven wrong. The beginning had me think it was a rehash of the events on Hoth\, but minutes in\, the sequence of events became and remained unpredictable\, keeping me on edge about what would happen\, and the homages to the original trilogy were spot on. This movie more than made up for the shortcomings in The Force Awakens. They did a fantastic job.
